title: WTB:  Certain T206 SLers - PSA 1, 2, or 3

posts.post_title: WTB:  Certain T206 SLers - PSA 1, 2, or 3
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Adam
I am looking to buy the following 6 T206 southern leaguers graded either PSA 1, PSA 2, or PSA 3:


1. Foster
2. Greminger
3. Hart (Bill)
4. Paige
5. Smith (Sid)
6. Thebo


Please email me at aamoniz@yahoo.com if you have any you would like to sell!  I am only interested in examples already graded PSA 1, PSA 2, or PSA 3.

Regards,
Adam

Bump to update list.  Down to needing only the 6 cards identified above, please email me if you have any PSA 1, PSA 2, or PSA 3s of these cards you would like to sell.
